content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace group at positions (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1.0, 1.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and source inventory containing iron ore.
- Stone furnace (position (3.0, 0.0)) with fuel inventory containing coal and source inventory containing iron ore.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly check your inventory updates to ensure you are managing resources effectively and not overloading any specific item.
